'''Mythcon 46''' was the forty-sixth annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference. 

*'''Theme:''' "The Arthurian Mythos"
*'''Guests of Honor:''' Jo Walton (fantasy author), and [[John D. Rateliff]] (Inklings and Tolkien scholar)
